product_description: grey colored 6 inch length, 3 inch width yoga mat made of natural rubber

copy_data.primary_copy: Find your center on our premium grey natural rubber yoga mat. Perfect grip, ideal size, pure comfort for your practice.
copy_data.headline: Elevate Your Flow
copy_data.description: Experience grounded stability with our eco-friendly natural rubber mat. Perfectly sized for home or studio, with superior grip and comfort.

claude_optimized_prompt: A serene modern yoga studio with natural light streaming through floor-to-ceiling windows, a rolled grey yoga mat on light wooden floors, surrounded by minimalist decor and potted plants. Shot from above at 45-degree angle, soft morning light creates gentle shadows, empty space in top right for text overlay

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A serene modern yoga studio with natural light streaming through floor-to-ceiling windows, featuring a rolled grey yoga mat placed on light wooden floors. The space is surrounded by minimalist decor and several potted green plants, creating a tranquil and inviting atmosphere. The scene is shot from above at a 45-degree angle, with soft morning light cascading through the windows and creating gentle shadows. There is intentional empty space in the top right corner for text overlay.
